summary: An individual maintained a friendship with another despite recognizing their self-serving motives, choosing to proceed with caution and reduced trust to manage the relationship effectively.
A person's pursuit of wealth and self-interest can overshadow genuine relationships, leading them to prioritize personal gain over friendship.
Understanding the true nature and intentions of others allows an individual to navigate complex relationships and protect themselves from potential betrayal.
Accepting the harsh realities of a relationship, an individual adapts their expectations and interactions to better align with the known motives of the other party.
